name: Death.exe
description:
Since the very beginning of humankind people have been philosophizing about death. What will happen? Is there a second life? Where will we be?
In Death.exe you slip into the role of a human who just passed away. But what you discover is far beyond your expectations. There is no time to rest in eternal peace! Get up and follow the dark path ahead. 

Fight your way through the dungeon, improve your endurance and enter the endless depths! Will you finally  escape the chains of your former life? Surrender is no valid option!

Changes V1.1:
- Tutorial will be turned on by default
- Fixed an issue where the player could leave the map and fall int the void
- Fixed an issue where the standard melee attack would not trigger
- Fixed the Gold and EXP display on the player UI
-Colliders are not visible anymore
1.1b:
-Fixed the Tutorial and eliminating the Enemy spawned in Tutorial bug
-Fixed Gold Drop and SFX on the Barrels
-Added Credits Screen
